content: Is there a recent workflow issues report? I'd like to make sure there aren't any substantive breaking changes there for the CDS/CQI resources.
Where can I find the workflow pattern alignment report?
each resource has a mapping to the kind of workflow resource pattern. So look at your resources->mapping tab
The alignment report hasn't worked in a year or more

Some form of that report is still being published via:
http://build.fhir.org/event.html#mappings
http://build.fhir.org/request.html#mappings
http://build.fhir.org/definition.html#mappings
@Lloyd McKenzie are these tables correct? if not, should they be removed since the report isn't working?
Those are correct so far as I'm aware. The original XSLT-based report was not (though it covered more)
